_description: TED Technology Radar (ThoughtWorks model). Quadrants: techniques, tools, platforms, integrations. Rings: adopt, trial, assess, hold.

blips.name: Event Sourcing (JSONL)
blips.description: Core state management pattern. 35+ ledgers, dual-write.

blips.name: Template-as-Contract
blips.description: LLM output contracts with golden fixture validation.

blips.name: Progressive Autonomy
blips.description: Empirically-driven autonomy ladder with quantitative gates.

blips.name: Human-in-the-Loop (Approval Gates)
blips.description: REQUIRES_OPERATOR_CONFIRMATION for write tools.

blips.name: Correction Signal Collection
blips.description: Builder Lane foundation. editDistance, hooks on mutations.

blips.name: Schema Versioning (JSONL)
blips.description: Weak schema + upcasting for non-destructive evolution. New for Cycle 13.

blips.name: Context Engineering
blips.description: Systematic context budget per LLM call. Harrison Chase priority.

blips.name: Prompt Registry
blips.description: Externalized versioned prompts with shadow testing.

blips.name: Content Isolation (Lethal Trifecta)
blips.description: Architectural separation of untrusted content processing.

blips.name: LLM-as-Judge Evaluation
blips.description: Andrew Ng pattern. Evaluate output quality using LLM scoring.

blips.name: Vector Store / RAG
blips.description: Semantic retrieval to supplement JSONL ledgers.

blips.name: Multi-Agent Decomposition
blips.description: CrewAI/LangGraph patterns for complex workflows.

blips.name: Dynamic Reasoning (ReAct/ToT)
blips.description: Hybrid reasoning for novel operator requests.

blips.name: Microsoft Graph API
blips.description: Core integration. Mail, Calendar, Planner, To Do, SharePoint.

blips.name: MCP Protocol
blips.description: 71 tools. 97M+ monthly SDK downloads industry-wide.

blips.name: OpenAI GPT-4o
blips.description: Primary LLM provider for production use.

blips.name: Anthropic Claude
blips.description: Available as fallback/alternative LLM provider.

blips.name: SQLite FTS5
blips.description: Local full-text search for ledger queries. Lightweight alternative to vector store.

blips.name: Temporal.io
blips.description: Durable execution for long-running workflows. Evaluate for complex state machines.

blips.name: Monday.com Integration
blips.description: Mentioned in architecture but not implemented.

blips.name: DocuSign Integration
blips.description: Mentioned in architecture but not implemented.
